glosses: Naples (a port city and comune, the capital of the Metropolitan City of Naples and the region of Campania, Italy)
Naples (a metropolitan city of Campania, established in 2015; in full, the Metropolitan City of Naples)

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish ناپولی (Napoli) and Italian Napoli, from Latin Neāpolis, from Ancient Greek Νεᾱ́πολῐς (Neā́polĭs), from νέᾱ (néā, “new”) + πόλῐς (pólĭs, “city”).
